snippet: State officials said Californians had surpassed a mandate to save water for a third consecutive month, using nearly 27 percent less in August than the same month in 2013.
abstract: California officials say residents have used almost 27 percent less water in August than in same period in 2013, exceeding mandate to conserve water use for third consecutive month.
lead_paragraph: State officials said Californians had surpassed a mandate to save water for a third consecutive month, using nearly 27 percent less in August than the same month in 2013.

headline.main: California: Goals on Water Cuts Met for Third Month
headline.print_headline: California: Goals on Water Cuts Met for Third Month
